title: Foundation of Strategy Building
overview: Learn the core principles of creating a profitable crypto trading strategy.
content: Understand the concept of edge in trading.
Identify your risk tolerance and trading style.
Familiarize yourself with market types: trending, ranging, volatile.
notes: A good strategy is built around your personal goals and the market's behavior.

title: Technical Indicators & Tools
overview: Master the key technical tools to support your trading decisions.
content: Learn about Moving Averages, RSI, MACD.
Practice using a charting platform like TradingView.
notes: Only use indicators that complement your strategy.

title: Backtesting Strategies
overview: Evaluate your strategy using historical data.
prerequisites: Knowledge of charting tools and indicators.
content: Mark entries and exits on historical charts.
notes: Backtesting provides a simulated performance before live trading.

title: Paper Trading
overview: Practice your strategy without risking capital.
content: Set up a paper trading account.
Execute trades according to your strategy rules.
notes: Paper trading bridges the gap between theory and live markets.

title: Risk Management
overview: Learn to control losses and maximize gains.
notes: Risk management ensures survival during losing streaks.

title: Live Trading Setup
overview: Prepare your live account for strategy execution.
content: Test order execution speed and reliability.
notes: Always start with small capital when going live.

title: Monitoring & Adjusting
overview: Track your performance and adapt to market changes.
content: Identify patterns in wins and losses.
notes: Continuous improvement is key to long-term success.

title: Scaling Up
notes: Scaling should never compromise risk management.
